title: About
text: Welcome to the Kolkata R UseR group, a community of scientists and programmers with a passion for using R for data analysis and visualization. Whether you’re a beginner or an expert, join us to learn and share knowledge about R programming, statistical modeling, and machine learning. Network with like-minded professionals, attend workshops, and discover new opportunities in the field of data science. Let’s come together to explore the endless possibilities of R and push the boundaries of what can be achieved with this powerful programming language. Join us and unlock the potential of R in science and technology!
